name: Oskar Back
text: Blackjack Pizza on Jewell and Garrison CONSISTENTLY makes THE BEST pizza we've had. We get the square pan pizza; crispy on the bottom, great sauce, loaded with toppings, for a very reasonable price. We've taken this place for granted for …More

name: Lynn Clannin
text: Great food - really like the calzone - this is the half I saved for the next day

name: Isaiah Williams
text: One of my favorite pizza spots. All around great prices, food and service. Ordered from here several times and have never been dissatisfied. Recommended go to when in a hurry and hungry!

name: Richard Charay
text: I placed an order online but it was missed at the pizzeria. They took of the issue immediately and made good on order. That is how you do business. I'm going to be a regular.

name: Joshua Jordan
text: I love this pizza place. Fast but small in the inside. Call ahead

name: Pete O
text: Great pick up special. Pizza is always fresh and accurate.

name: Cheryl Montgomery
text: I ordered the large Jackpot pizza and was very disappointed. It was black around the edges and the meat was dry and crunchy. It was way over cooked. I called and talked to the manager he didn’t want to replace it. He said that’s how it’s supposed to be. I will never go back.

name: The Pedicab Avenger
text: This is our go to! If you live in CO you know Blackjack.  This one is always particularly good on our experience and they even will often search and apply their companies coupons and specials for you!

name: D Hatch
text: I just moved into the neighborhood and I'm so happy to be in a Blackjack delivery area again. Ordered my first pizza in the new place and Trevor was super chill and nice! Thanks!

name: Evan Cyganiewicz
text: I’ve been going to this location for years it’s a great place very friendly and the pizzas are amazing

name: Albert Tafoya
text: I love this blackjack pizza bomb love the jack-pot pizza in the hot wing's are the best here thank you blackjacks for making great pizza&wing's

name: ocean and Joli
text: Tried one night to order online and site would not work. And then couldn't get answer on the phone. Still give them 3 ⭐ because I like blackjack pizza. Hard to find pizza places bow days that offer green olives as a topping. Which one best ones

name: Kendra Valdez
text: This place is amazing from their outstanding customer service to the amazing pizza and calzones they go above and beyond every time. I had an order that I admoditly ordered wrong and they fixed it for us. They are always on time and very affordable I will always use this location if I could give 10 stars I would!!!!

name: Nakita Martin
text: Yummy in my tummy, clean and fast service.

name: Allen Ortega
text: Ordered from this location 3 times now. Twice took a hour for delivery once took hour and a half for delivery. Not once was my food hot. I live 5 mins away. I understand there are other deliveries but a hour to 1.5 hours for delivery only a …More

name: Jason Hartgrave
text: Their square pizza is something not to be missed. The fresh ingredients and speedy service made this my new go to pizza place. A real lifesaver during the Rona virus lock down, these guys are heroes.

name: Logan C
text: Friendly people and good grub

name: Kelly Coxen
text: great pizza, reasonable price

name: Sam Baumann
text: We were visiting for a Red Rocks concert and our thought process was to order a pizza, eat it for dinner, and leave the rest in the car for after the show (only thing we could think of that wouldn't spoil without a cooler). Blackjack was …More

name: Sarah Gregonis
text: I love this BlackJack. They are friendly and very fast for pickup orders! Chris (manager?) Is personable and the whole team makes it a pleasant experience every time. As for the pizza/salads/wings, always been perfect, never had an issue.

name: Philip Chavez
text: Ordered delivery, second time at this location as I moved to this area six weeks ago. Great service, reasonable prices for good pizza. The pizza, salads and breadsticks are always fresh with tasty ingredients.  They said delivery may be a …More

name: Gail Joha
text: They were late 1hr. Compt. Pizzas.

name: Dave Sellards
text: Food was very good. The price was fair. The service was excellent. I prefer the Blackjack Pizza on Garrison at Jewell.

name: Elle E
text: Great food, healthier ingredients, I love the sauce, their pizza is better than pizza hut

name: James Armstrong
text:
At Blackjack pizza, you get the extra cheese you order and pay for.

Unlike every other pizza chain, which systematically refuses to serve extra …More

name: Bacnthaday43
text: Love their pizzas and salads great prices and you can coupon also.

name: Roman Martinez
text: Pizza came burnt and inedible. Called the manager, explained this situation. He says he refuses to help me because apparently, i wanted it burnt? The ticket says "well done" which was an input error.Well done on a NY style crust? WHO WOULD …More

name: Kathy Wilson
text: Great pizza, the employees are always pleasant. Love my neighborhood black jack pizza.

name: David Kyllonen
text: You have to check them out. Great pizza! Way worth the price they pay!

name: Kiley Horst
text: First time we ordered was amazing.. everything was perfect and it was our first time. We ordered tonight and when we got the pizza it had no sauce .. wasn't cooked fully and the cheese was o my on a couple slices. Things happen.. I …More

name: Dean Lopez
text: A Awesome Race Track

text: Just what I wanted! I'm new in town and I like to try local places and this place was awesome! Very good.

name: Amy Mulvey
text:
I hadn't had Blackjack Pizza in about 8 years! Came back home to Colorado and was pleased to see they're still kickin' it!
Delicious food and a great value. Jewell and Garrison is our favorite place :)

name: Derrick Roberts
text: This is my family's favorite pizza chain in the metro area.  Everytime we visit we order some to take back to the country.

name: David Claussen
text: Great value pizza

name: Steve Wilder
text: Blackjack pizza is my favorite chain in Colorado!

name: Richard Moore
text: The best and most worthwhile 8 minute wait nearly 1minute from my home. After along day of working a quick stop here gets a good pie and it's made to order. Fresh hot and the staff I've felt with are always warm in their welcome just …More

name: Teresa Howard
text: The service was excellent the pizza was done so quickly.

name: Todd Skidmore
text:
Wow what a let down.  I tried BJ pizza for the first time last night.  Sorry I wasted 35 bucks. The delivery was pretty fast. The pizza was hot but it had a metallic after taste like the sauce came from a can.
Won't make that mistake again.

name: Jesse Elder
text: Regardless of it being a chain restaurant, this one is always on time. Not only is Blackjack Pizza excellent, especially the pan pizza, it is decently priced. Anyone can afford blackjack and expect good food.

name: Krista Almy
text: Have to stay that I have ordered from these guys 3 times in the past 2 months and it's been great each time. Comes hot, fresh, plenty of cheese and to the edges. I usually order the pan with extra sauce and they do a good job but it could …More

name: Sabrina O
text: I am overly impressed and humbled by my must recent experience.  This location has always been spot on with service and quality, but this last visit will stay with me forever. …More

text: Some of the best pizza I've ever had! Amazing staff!

name: DerekZ Z
text: Although this place doesn't seem to know how to cut a pizza. It's good quality for a reasonable price. Especially if you carry out at this particular locaty

name: Marcia Taylor
text: Delicious pizza and great employees

name: Charmaine Esquibel
text: The manager Chris is very Rude and has hung up twice when asked his name. Very unprofessional I have been going to this Black Jack for 15 years and will not return.

name: Brian Schmitz
text: I've ordered from them 30 times from the same location. Good pizza. Now today only for some reason they don't deliver to my address. The guy said I could speak to the manager. I said forget it and I'll get my pizza elsewhere if they no longer want business

name: Linda Cooper
text: Always the best! Have been coming here for many years. Great pizza and friendly service.

name: Jeremiah Reeves
text: I thought the point of delivery is to have food delivered to your door. The lazy delivery driver did not want to come up to the third floor until I refused to go down. Then he proceeded to tell me that our drivers don’t come into the …More

name: Michael Pishaki
text: Super fast service for both carryout and delivery.  Best salads for a pizza place.  Price of food and delivery charge are reasonable.  Highly recommend over the more popular pizza chains.

name: La-Shon Archibald

text: They need another star !! It is a blizzard out side and they still are making pizza and even making deliveries …More

name: Jesse Packwood
text: Started ordering pizza here because the price can’t be beat and now it’s the only pizza we order cause it’s just that good

name: Danielle Darby
text: My go-to on a Friday night! Consistently excellent service.

name: James Thomas
text: The pizza pies are always good customer service is always excellent  prices are reasonable wings were amazing Always by the bone in wings. Thank you for a wonderful dining experience for takeout highly recommended

name: Mike F
text: Love the calzones here. Really the only place around I've found that they're decent sized and delicious.

name: Adam Stevens
text: I mean you can never go wrong with pizza! Our normal place was closing and decided to give this place a shot. Only complaint was there was not enough sauce on our pizza. Got the chicken bacon ranch pizza. Other wise it was not to bad of place. Walked right in to order a take out.

name: Enrique Franco
text: Great place for pizza. Always consistently good.

name: drw 13
text: Pan Pizza is great. Best Pizza prices around. Better than Dominos, Papa John’s, Little Ceasers, & really any other commercial chain. Pizza & Price hard to beat! Surprised they don’t advertise more! They should add grinders!

name: Mandy Mcwilliams
text: So I was just in here and there was a man filling the cheese and vegetables with no gloves on I personally watched him touch 3 different things AFTER moving a trash can. No gloves no washing NOTHING! I worked in food and there is no reason for that! Absolutely disgusting!

name: Susan Sandoval
text: Love the pizza sauce

name: Marcie Lapehn
text: No stars is not an option. We've now ordered 3 times from this Blackjack store and all 3 orders have been completely messed up. First of all, their website has pictures that do not show you what you're actually ordering. Second of all, they …More

text: The girl was not wearing gloves and she went to go take my order and pay with my credit car and then she went back to tossing though not sanitary

text:
Customer service is a must for me, that said...
I ordered to be told 45min delivery time. After 55min, I called in. The manager was actually calling me on the other line to inform me that the driver had …More

text: Always on time and have never made a mistake on my orders... Blackjack is still Colorados best home grown pizza company in my opinion

text: This store is the worste black jack pizza I have ever tried to order from, i am .2 miles outside of their zone but did not bother to tell me that and instead charged my card and didnt even tell me what had happened. Completely …More

name: Adrienna Coffield
text: Great place, awesome service.  They get the order right every time, that doesn't happen at most restaurants anymore. 5 stars!

name: Larry Rhineheimer
text: Always great!

name: Do Best Possible LLC
text: I am discovering something positive about Denver...there are many places that serve a great pizza. This location served me well and was under $10, which is unheard of! Unless you go with Little Ceasars (barf).

name: Katrina Schaffert
text: Great pizza!!! Awesome...thank you!!! Located on Garrison St. in Lakewood, CO.:)

name: Brian Smith
text: Jon is always pleasant and a dose of awesome and seems to always have a friendly, nice crew. The food is delicious, freshly prepped and Jon keeps his pizza kitchen clean while he husltes an immense amount of pizzas throughthe oven.    Stay awesome Jon

name: Not Available
text: Excellent Service. Ordered a bit late, pizza was delivered FAST HOT and DELICIOUS! Kudos to this store and staff!

text: Guy was rude i understand that yall are busy today but the guy i talked to was so rude n pushy

text: Great place with great customer service. Not to mention the food is amazing!

name: Chris Foltz
text: We order here at least once a week for years now, order is always correct and the employees always manage to beat even their own advertised price. The quality of the food is excellent in our opinions, one of my children demands Blackjack only now!

text: They have messes up our order several times. And what is the use if the number you give them to call you but instead they don't and take food away.  Why ask for a number if your not going to use it. Will not go there again. Bad way to run a business.
